hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf *
mkdir include cp -r /home/clydeliu/projects/3rdParty/QtCharts/2.1/include/QtCharts include tar -cv include/QtCharts >> include.tar
mkdir lib/ mkdir lib/cMT3000 cp /home/clydeliu/projects/3rdParty/QtCharts/2.1/Src/lib/cMT3000/libQt5Charts.a lib/cMT3000 tar -cv lib/cMT3000 >> lib_cMT3000.tar
mkdir lib/cMT-iv5 cp /home/clydeliu/projects/3rdParty/QtCharts/2.1_no_opengl/Src/lib/cMT-iv5/libQt5Charts.a lib/cMT-iv5 tar -cv lib/cMT-iv5 >> lib_cMT-iv5.tar
mkdir lib/Ubuntu cp /home/clydeliu/projects/3rdParty/QtCharts/2.1/Src/lib/Ubuntu/libQt5Charts.a lib/Ubuntu tar -cv lib/Ubuntu >> lib_Ubuntu.tar
